response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than its face value, but considering the current market conditions and our commitment to making this opportunity accessible, we're offering it to you at an introductory price of $14,500. This special offer is exclusive to you and is valid for the next 24 hours. Don't miss out on this exceptional chance to own something truly remarkable.", "product_price": 14500}
